channel.title: BMW, 2000, E39, M5 on E39Source
channel.description: Recent content in BMW, 2000, E39, M5 on E39Source

item.title: Jay’s 2000 BMW E39 M5
item.description: Hello E39Source! I am a new member to this website, and I wanted to get more involved with this close knit group of E39 enthusiasts. I just recently purchased my first M5! I bought it in Seattle, Washington with 148,000 miles on the clock. The interior is immaculate, along with the rest of the car. It honestly doesn’t feel as if it has covered 148,000 miles. I’ve driven upwards of ten M5s and this one takes the cake. It has plenty of get-up and go and, so far has none of the common E39 issues!
